channel.title: Static Shock: tags: english
channel.description: A static site about static shocks

item.title: Lewis Carroll
item.description:
Alice was not much surprised at this, she was getting so used to queer things happening. While she was looking at the place where it had been, it suddenly appeared again.

'By-the-bye, what became of the baby?' said the Cat. 'I'd nearly forgotten to ask.'

item.title: H G Wells
item.description: "It's bows and arrows against the lightning, anyhow," said the artilleryman. "They 'aven't seen that fire-beam yet."
